cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlbumInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, AlbumInterface
    Representation of a photo album with a name as well as a HashMap of photos.
    Author:
    Ben Green
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
